item.title: Number Pioneer
item.description: • A mathematical boad game design for elementary school students to practice arithmetic operations.

item.title: About Me
item.description: Nice to meet you!!ðŸ§¸ Iâ€™m Xinger(Stella) from Shanghai, China. With a formal education in educational technology and psychology, I am passionate about implementing educational interventions with emerging technologies. I am a masterâ€™s candidate for the LST (Learning Sciences and Technologies) program at the University of Pennsylvania. Besides, I am currently a user operationist intern working at EdwithU, a Chinese online community of education practitioners. Previous, I was a product manager intern at Jiliguala, mainly assisting in designing a gamification learning app for preschoolers in China.
